headers.subject: [tosdr:2895] Gittip: [Mediocre] ToS are legalese

subject: Gittip: [Mediocre] ToS are legalese
text:
Title: [Mediocre] ToS are legalese
Topic: readability
Summary: The ToS contains several difficult-to-understand clauses and much capitalized text. 
Score: 50

Discussion:

Some individual sections are easy to read, but others are not at all and use language that may be complex for someone unfamiliar with legal terms.

Note: This is a part of the series of ratings as a part of gittip issue #1898.

https://github.com/gittip/www.gittip.com/issues/1898

References:

Gittip Terms of Service 

https://www.gittip.com/about/terms/

Gittip Privacy Policy

https://www.gittip.com/about/privacy/
